title: Letter
marks: Signature and Mark LLC:  [ 頼春水 ]
description: fifteen lines of scrawling cursive, first and sixth lines are bolder; far L line is much bigger, bolder, and written with more distinct characters; mounted on thicker paper freckled with gold leaf flecks
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
